T02D3781:222a-0: @222a * // dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs so /
T02D3781:222a-4: // / # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3781:222a-5: bkra shis gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku //
T02D3781:222a-6: gcig nyid dang ni du ma nyid kyang rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D3781:222a-7: ma gos gzugs med rdul dang bral ba gang yin pa'i //
T02D3781:222a-8: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog //
T02D3781:222b-0: bkra @222b shis gang zhig sangs rgyas sras kyis yongs bskor zhing //
T02D3781:222b-1: longs spyod rdzogs sku dam chos kyi ni gsung dang bcas //
T02D3781:222b-2: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su brgyan gyur pa //
T02D3781:222b-3: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs
T02D3781:222b-4: shog / bkra shis gang zhig nags kyi me ni
T02D3781:222b-5: mched pa ltar // 'jug dang 'bar dang yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yis //
T02D3781:222b-6: sprul pa'i sku mchog gzhan gyi don ni mdzad pa po //
T02D3781:222b-7: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog //
T02D3781:222b-8: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun la phan byed pa'i //
T02D3781:222b-9: sangs rgyas rnam dag blo ldan nyis pa'i tshogs dang bral //
T02D3781:222b-10: shes rab yan lag 'dus pas mdzes pa bde ba'i
T02D3781:222b-11: bdag / bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni
T02D3781:222b-13: bkra shis gang zhig lha dang lha min mis mchod pa //
T02D3781:222b-14: de yi bstan pa'i dam chos bla na med pa ni //
T02D3781:222b-15: bdag med 'jig rten gsum la rab tu grags pa yi //
T02D3781:222b-16: bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur //
T02D3781:222b-17: bkra shis gang zhig rab mchog dam chos rtag tu 'dzin //
T02D3781:222b-18: bzang po'i sar zhugs sangs rgyas sras po tshogs kyi
T02D3781:222b-19: mchog / rnam pa kun du sems can don mdzad
T02D3781:222b-20: bkra shis bzang // bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur ;
T02D3781:222b-21: / zhes bya ba ni slob dpon snang byed zla
T02D3781:222b-22: bas mdzad pa sangs rgyas sku gsum chos dang dge
